title: Guns on London streets, 2007.
name: Guns on London streets, 2007.
description:
A Map by Caatlondon

Pinpointing the effect of the illegal gun trade on the lives of Londoners.

properties.name: 14th April: 14 y.o. shot in the neck in drive-by
properties.description: Posted by Caatlondon

properties.name: 14th February: Billy Cox, 15.
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonAt home in Clapham High Street.

properties.name: 15th May: 52 year old shot by police
properties.description: Posted by Caatlondon

properties.name: 17th February: Craig Thomas, 28.
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonBelieved to have been shot while sitting in a grey Fiat Punto.

properties.name: 22nd June: Carlos Eduardo Cegove Moureno, 23.
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonChef shot dead outside a friend\'s house.

properties.name: 23rd July: James Oyebola, 47.
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonBouncer shot in the head for asking people not to smoke.

properties.name: 23rd June: Annaka Keniesha Pinto, 17.
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonCritically injured after a row at the Swan pub and died in hospital.

properties.name: 24th January: Robert Lettin, 57.
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonShot at home with his own high-powered air rifle.

properties.name: 26th July: Abukar Mahamed, 16.
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonDavid Taitt, 20, appeared at Camberwell Green magistrates\' court charged with the murder.

properties.name: 27th April: Alfred Liverpool, 25.
properties.description: Posted by Caatlondon

properties.name: 27th March: Two found shot dead
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonThe bodies of the 37-year-old man and 43-year-old woman were found at a property in Bracondale Road, Abbey Wood. A murder investigation was launched.

properties.name: 28th April: man shot in Leyton
properties.description: Posted by Caatlondon

properties.name: 28th March: Teenager shot in foot
properties.description: Posted by Caatlondon

properties.name: 2nd January: Barrington Williams-Samuels, 19.
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonOpposite Palace Pavilion, 229 Lower Clapton Road

properties.name: 3rd February: James Smartt-Ford, 16.
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonStreatham Ice Rink, 386 Streatham High Road.

properties.name: 3rd May: Warren Gray, 24.
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonShot after a chase through a block of flats.

properties.name: 4th February: Chamberlain Igwemba, 47.
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonAnother also seriously injured at a flat in Flamborough House, Clayton Road

properties.name: 4th March: 21 year old shot at outside club.
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonThe gun misfired and the attacker was arrested.

properties.name: 4th March: Tyno Kavuala, 20.
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonPolice were called to Scrubs Lane in Harlesden, north-west London, on Sunday afternoon to reports of a shooting. Officers discovered a man in his 20s had suffered multiple gunshot wounds. http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/london/6424959.stm

properties.name: 4th March: policeman shot
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonThe officer, from Southwark, was unhurt in the shooting in Beaton Close, Peckham.

properties.name: 6th April: Krystal Hart, 22.
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonAt her home in Belleville Road, the six-months-pregnant woman was apparently shot over a parking space.

properties.name: 6th February: Michael Dosunmu, 15.
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonAt home on Diamond Street.

properties.name: 9th April: 19 year old shot in head
properties.description: Posted by BoringlovechildA 19-year-old was hit in the head in Harold Road, Plaistow, east London, and is critically ill in a London Hospital.
